item.description:
Want to know what is Steampunk? Google it!

This phootshoot was suggested by Meghan (https://www.facebook.com/EYEFUL.Beauty), and the event host will be Shelley who also will be the MUA for the event.

The location of this photoshoot will be at a large area of a building that under construction that has bare ceiling and bare floor. There will be at least three shooting areas, two with natural light (one from large windows, and one from multiple small windows) and one with hot light.

This photoshoot will be a lot of fun and you will get great images for your portfolio.

There are big costs and works involves in this shoot, so I do need help from all of you (please come one hour early if you would like to help):

Prop and lighting setup: ichi and ...

area1 - large windows

area2 - multiple small windows

area3 - Altman spot lights

Models:

1) Penny Candy

2) Dina

3) Courtney

4) Kat

5) Leah

6) Lori

You could find the photo of Penny in the photo section:

http://www.meetup.com/bostonportraitphotographers/photos/8124152/

photos of April, Courtney, Kat, Leah and Marissa is listed in the SteampunkModels.pdf file:

http://www.meetup.com/bostonportraitphotographers/files/

MUA: Shelley

Steampunk Styling will be sponsored by Cloak & Dagger Creations

Building maintenance personnel: Mike

 

To make sure that I do have enough cash to prepare for this photoshoot. I appreciated very much if you could pay now or as soon as you can (PayPal is preferred).

 

The cost of attending this photoshoot is $60.00

Notes: Will use DRY ICE to create some smoke effect for this photoshoot.
item.name: Steampunk Photoshoot on Sunday, May 20th from 3PM to 6PM
